name: Joybound People & Pets - Pet Safety Net
description: Emergency resources to prevent pet surrender including food, vet care assistance, and supplies
fullDescription: Joybound's Pet Safety Net provides emergency resources to help families keep their pets during times of crisis or financial hardship.
whatTheyOffer:
- Emergency pet food assistance
- Veterinary care financial assistance
- Pet supplies (leashes, bowls, beds)
- Temporary foster care during emergencies
- Counseling to prevent pet surrender
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Contra Costa County resident
2. Contact Joybound to explain your situation
3. Staff will assess needs and available resources
4. Receive assistance based on availability and need
keywords: Joybound, Pet Safety Net, emergency pet help, vet assistance, pet supplies, foster care, crisis, Contra Costa, prevent surrender
